title: New: Sasha – Picking Flowers
body:
There’s a gloriously wistful nature to Londoner **Sasha’s** latest track, _Picking Flowers_.

With elements of Beach House and Maggie Rogers, it’s ethereal and delicate whilst proving resoundingly powerful. With a couple of singles already under her belt, and more music on the horizon, Sasha has cemented her place as one of the UK’s most exciting new songwriters. Check it out below.
